cloud.title: Boks Login

user.title: Manual Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Boks credential.

**Preference Order:**
1. **Master Key (64 chars):** Full access.
2. **Config Key (8 chars):** Standard access.

add_parcel.name: Add Parcel
add_parcel.description: Adds a new parcel to the list

description.name: Description
description.description: Adds a description to the parcel

add_pin_code.name: Add PIN Code
add_pin_code.description: Adds a new PIN code to the Boks. Requires Configuration Key. Returns the created code.

code.name: PIN Code
code.description: The 6-character PIN code (0-9, A, B). If omitted, a random code will be generated.

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of code to create.

index.name: Index
index.description: The index for the code (only for Master codes, 0-255).

delete_pin_code.name: Delete PIN Code
delete_pin_code.description: Deletes a PIN code from the Boks. Requires Configuration Key.

identifier.name: Identifier
identifier.description: The PIN Code itself (for Single/Multi/Master) or the Index (for Master).

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of code to delete.

sync_logs.name: Sync Logs
sync_logs.description: Manually retrieve logs from the Boks and trigger associated events.
